message.content:
Enye yezinto okungokwakho ukuyenza kwi-software ye-antivirus kunye namanyathelo okhuseleko:

1. Thola isofthiwe ye-antivirus: Landa isofthiwe ye-antivirus kwi-intanethi ngokusebenzisa isixhobo sakho somsebenzisi. Qhathanisa imibhalo yabasebenzisi nokuba besonwabile ukuthenga isofthiwe ye-antivirus noma ukufumana isofthiwe ye-antivirus enokufuneka.

2. Funda ukwakha nesetshenziselwa somsebenzisi: Landa isofthiwe ye-antivirus kwi-kompyuter yakho futhi yenza ukuba uvakashele i-inthanethi. Funda imibhalo ye-software yokuhlangabezana nesetshenziselwa somsebenzisi ukuze ube nokwazi ukuyisebenzisa ngendlela enokuthandayo.

3. Cima amalware: Qhathanisa isofthiwe ye-antivirus ngokuhlangabeza ngezifundo zalo ngezifundo zanamanye amathuluzi. Singakunceda ukuze uqinisekise ukuthi isofthiwe ye-antivirus ifaka phantsi amalware anamathuluzi apho kuzo khona kwi-khompyutha yakho.

4. Hlela ngemfihlo: Qhathanisa imibhalo yabasebenzisi ngokungabikho ngamalungelo abasebenzisa. Yenza isetshenziselwa somsebenzisi lwe-antivirus lingumkhawulo wokukhuseleka okuphelele okukhuselekileyo ngamanye amathuluzi.

5. Hlaziya kwi-intanethi: Qhathanisa ukulawula ukusebenza kwe-software ye-antivirus kwi-intanethi. Khetha izixhobo zokuhlaziya ezikhuseleko k
